name: Surmodics, Inc.
description: Surmodics, Inc. is a leading provider of medical device and in vitro diagnostic technologies, committed to enhancing patient outcomes through innovative solutions. Established in 1979 and headquartered in Eden Prairie, Minnesota, Surmodics specializes in developing and manufacturing coatings for medical devices, as well as providing a range of products and services that support the medical device industry. The company's proprietary technology platforms include drug-eluting coatings, hydrophilic coatings, and surface modification technologies, which are designed to improve the performance and safety of medical devices. Surmodics has a strong presence in the cardiovascular, ophthalmic, and vascular markets, offering products that address critical healthcare challenges. In addition to its coatings business, Surmodics also provides contract development and manufacturing services, leveraging its expertise to help partners bring their medical devices to market efficiently. The company’s mission is to be the partner of choice for medical device manufacturers by delivering high-quality products and services that drive innovation and improve patient care. Surmodics is dedicated to advancing healthcare through collaboration, research, and a commitment to excellence in everything it does.
